file_content.text: I heard we lost the Dantooine Nomad yesterday. Wasn't she...?
My son's ship? He's fine. They evacuated almost everyone before the Mantellian separatists finished her off.
Now my girls are talking about joining up. Blast it, I should be the one putting on a uniform.
That's why I keep arguing for more military spending--we're better placed to help them here.
I know, I know. But a battlefield's no place for the young.
